Package berlin

Interface Summary
AI The artificial intelligence interface.
 

Class Summary
Game Represents the state of the game.
Infos Contains general informations about the game.
Move Represents one component of the output of your AI: a list of moves to crush your enemies!
Node Represents one component of the Map which is a graph (a set of nodes linked together).
Player Your AI or the AI of another Berlin's player.
Server The server.
